releases.name: v0.5.6-Beta
releases.body:
## Bug Fixes
* Windows installer error https://github.com/zulip/zulip-electron/issues/101
* Compile and build error in native node modules + spellchecker [Windows]
* Missing icon on installing [Windows]

## Improvements 
* Using NSIS instead of [Squirrel.Windows](https://github.com/Squirrel/Squirrel.Windows) on windows.
* Autoupdates: now using [electron-updater](https://www.npmjs.com/package/electron-updater). Removed nuts dependency.

## Update - `electron-log` error is fixed in macOs installer. Please re-download it.

releases.name: v0.5.4-Beta
releases.body:
🎉   first beta release.

# Changelog:
- Fixed #95 which was breaking:
  - Auto-updates
  - Spellchecker
  - Zooming functionality 
- Removed unused node modules
- Using stable version for node modules 
- Added icon for AppImage

releases.name: v0.5.3-Beta
releases.body:
- 🎉  Added automatic update support on Windows 
- Fixed #88 - javascript error when electron has been left running and try to right-click 
- Fixed error - Unregister Spellchecker while window is closed
- Fixed - Keyboard shortcuts not getting unregistered 
- Minor UI Changes

releases.name: v0.5.2-Beta
releases.body:
Changelog:
- ⚡️ Added automatic app updates for macOS
- Better tray icons
- Blurry Unity icon fixed #90 [Linux]

## Update - Added windows installer for 32 bit machine

releases.name: v0.5.1-Beta
releases.body:
🎉  Lots of new changes and probably 2x better than the last pre-release.

Changelog:
- Added Spellchecker support with correct spell suggestions
- Added Code-Signing on MAC
- Added Win/linux/Mac installers
- Added Continuous Integration on travis and appveyor
- Open internal links in app only and external in default browser
- Better icons
- Electron version updated to v1.4.7
- Using two package.json structure
- Node integration disabled in main window due to jquery error
- Now using electron-builder for packaging instead of electron-packager
- Removed electron-context-menu and simple-spellchecker dependency 

# Bug Fixed
- Better error handling when user enters wrong zulip server - #50 
- Fixed close Zulip window JavaScript error - #32 
- Fixed opening image in default browser - #68  
- Fixed #56  
- Fixed native notifications issue on linux #87

releases.name: v0.0.1-alpha
releases.body:
Initial release! It's probably buggy! Please try it and report back :ghost:.

I've only built installers for OSX so far, and I've only been able to test them out on a few machines. I'll build some packages for Linux/Windows as soon as I can.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to open an issue!
